title: The Asset Allocator: Longest Expansion On Record – Now What?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Economists, investment strategists and market commentators make it sound as though our portfolio moves depend on a view of U.S.-China trade talks and the like. But advisors generally understand that the key criterion is the client’s objective, be that growth, income or capital preservation. This podcast (5:05) argues that, because of the economy’s perplexing twists and turns, most investors benefit from tilting in one direction, but hedging in another. Learn more about your ad choices.
